cards.rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
The second spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control that entered this turn.
{3}, {T}: Exile another target creature, then return that card to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.
Whenever another creature enters, its controller may pay {1}. If they do, tap that creature. Otherwise, its controller sacrifices it.

Flying
Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token. You may have any number of those tokens enter tapped and attacking.

Flash
When this creature enters, exile up to one target spell or nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its controller may cast it by paying {2} rather than paying its mana cost.

At the beginning of your end step, for each nonland permanent card in your graveyard with the least mana value among cards in your graveyard, return that card to the battlefield tapped with a finality counter on it. It's a 5/5 Spirit creature in addition to its other types.

Double strike, lifelink
When Zhalle enters, for each player whose life total is less than 10, that player's life total becomes 10.
Whenever a player gains life during your turn, if it's the first time that player gained life this turn, draw a card.
Destroy each nonland permanent with the same mana value as any other nonland permanent in play.

Whenever a creature dies, return it from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield under that player's control at the beginning of their next end step.
{T}, Exile target creature card from a graveyard: Add {C}{C}{C} and create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

Whenever you sacrifice one or more creatures, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn. X is the number of creatures sacrificed.
• Create X 1/1 Spirit creature tokens.
• Create an X/X Construct artifact creature token.

Lien can't attack alone.
After blockers are declared, choose a blocked creature you control at random. That creature gains first strike, deathtouch, and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you draw a card and lose 1 life” until end of turn.

When Grenni enters, divide 6 as you choose between X and Y, then create Flunnore, a legendary X/Y colorless Spirit creature token with “When Flunnore enters, it fights up to one target creature.” [i](X or Y can be 0.)[/i]

[i]Paragon[/i] — This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a creature with power different than each other creature's power.
Exile target nonland permanent.

Trample

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Kollept, put that many +1/+1 counters on each other creature you control. This ability triggers only once each turn.

[i]Insanity [/i]— When Miroa enters and at the beginning of each upkeep, if two or more cards were put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, it becomes a copy of any creature on the battlefield except it has this ability. Otherwise, mill two cards.

Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell, activated ability, or triggered ability.
• Target player gains control of target activated ability or triggered ability. [i](They don't choose new targets for it.)[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, resound. [i](Trigger any number of resound abilities among permanents you control.)[/i]
Creatures you control have “Resound — Untap up to one target permanent.”

When this artifact enters, surveil 2, then draw two cards. You gain 2 life.

Sacrifice an artifact: This creature gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
When this creature dies or leaves your graveyard during your turn, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

cards.rules_text: Sacrifice a creature: Until end of turn, target creature, instant, or sorcery card in your graveyard gains cull. The cull cost is equal to that card's mana cost. Search any number of opponents' libraries for up to three cards with different names and exile them. An opponent chooses one or more of those cards. You may play the chosen cards for as long as they remain exiled, and mana of any type may be spent to cast those spells.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile two creature cards put into your graveyard this turn.
